ygData.subject: Re: Temple of Solusek Ro
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh. They probably want letters delivered to Quenos and Kelethin or something. -- Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity. GAT
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Oct 05/99, David Knadler <dknadler@...> wrote:
> From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>
>
> Excellent! This is good news indeed. As far as "bard" quests go, we're
> really getting screwed. In fact, I was under the impression that there
> wouldn't be any bard quests at the new temple. This snippet has brightened
> by day for sure. However, if they are anything like the few quests we
> already have, they probably won't be worth doing (IMO).

Heh. They probably want letters delivered to Quenos and Kelethin or
something.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
